price: Enyi mlio amini! Mcheni Mwenyezi Mungu kama ipasavyo kumcha; wala msife ila nanyi ni Waislamu.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ تُقَاتِهِۦ وَلَا تَمُوتُنَّ إِلَّا وَأَنتُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ
footnotes: Hakika mlango wa shari uwazi ikiwa hamumchi Mwenyezi Mungu. Basi enyi mlio amini! Mkhofuni Mwenyezi Mungu kwa khofu inayopasa, kwa kutenda anayo amrisha, na kuyaepuka anayo yakataza. Na dumuni juu ya Uislamu mpaka mtakapo kutana na Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha ḥaqqa tuqātihi walā tamūtunna illā wa-antum mus'limūna
